title: Body Detox Therapy
cleaned_text: In a healthy state, your body is well-equipped and has a sophisticated way of eliminating toxins. These protective systems can be impacted by aging, fear, stress, and illnesses. What is bioelectromagnetic energy body detox therapy? TAMA Touchless Therapy is a series of wellness and aesthetic treatments that release stagnant lymph, boost the immune system, and restore balance to the body's natural electromagnetic qualities for total rejuvenation. What are the benefits of this therapy? Detox - Balance - Boost Immune System - Oxygenate - Increase Drainage - Reduce Inflammation
